body.enterVerificationCode: Enter the verification code you received.

https://domivice.com/probs/bad-request: There was a problem with the information you provided.

https://domivice.com/probs/internal-erro: There was a problem on our side. Please try again later.

https://domivice.com/probs/user-verifica: We were not able to verify the provided contact information. Please try again.
